story.title: Our Story
story.content: XYRA was born from a passion for fishing and a desire to bring elegance to the sport. We believe that fishing is not just a hobby—it's a lifestyle that deserves sophistication and style.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower women who love fishing with premium gear that combines functionality with timeless elegance. Every product is designed with the modern angler in mind.
